announcements.description: The Castanea Genome Database was restructured based on HortGenome Search Engine API.
The genomic data of three Chinese chestnut cultivars has been integrated into CGD.
The article of ‘Beta-Amylase and Phosphatidic Acid Involved in Recalcitrant Seed Germination of Chinese Chestnut’ was published in Frontiers in plant science.
The Chinese chestnut cultivar ‘Jingshuhong’ has been authorized by Tree Variety Approval Committee of the National Forestry and Grassland Administration.
The genomic data of Chinese chestnut cultivar N11-1 is integrated into CGD.
The Castanea Genome Database (CGD) is up running.
